about_the_game:
In Emojis Battle, you will battle against the renowned Bluemojis to save your kingdom. Take on the role of the Yellow Emojis and triumph in this year-long conflict between the Blue and Yellow Emojis, ignited by the king of the once-united lands refusing to grant the Bluemojis their own national day.

Freedom of Choice:

No boundaries! Assemble your own army of Yellow Emojis to match your strategy. Choose their weapons and lead them into battle against the Bluemojis!

Bluemojis:

Be careful—there are over 30 different types of Bluemojis, each excelling in unique ways and growing stronger with every round!

Diversity:

Battle across diverse maps, each presenting unique challenges shaped by nature, time, and terrain, while expanding your army with new recruits as the war progresses!

Unpredictable Situations:

Beware—the Bluemojis are constantly coming up with new strategies and weapons to overpower you. With their ever-evolving tactics and mechanics, every encounter presents an unexpected surprise!

Game Updates:

Emojis Battle is a live game that will continuously receive updates, introducing new maps, Bluemojis, Yellow Emojis, upgrades, and much more!

name: Emojis Battle

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 / AMD FX-4100 / 1.8 GHz or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 650 / AMD Radeon HD 7770 / Intel HD Graphics 620 (OpenGL 2.0 compatible)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows-compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4460 / AMD Ryzen 3 1200 / 2.5 GHz or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 Ti / AMD Radeon RX 560 (OpenGL 4.5 compatible)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows-compatible sound card

short_description: Create your own army of Yellow Emojis to match your strategy. Strengthen them to fight the Bluemojis. Stay vigilant, as Bluemojis grow stronger with each round, requiring you to adjust to new kinds of Bluemojis and different battle locations. Develop strategies, enhance your army, and make history!
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Azerbaijani, Hindi, Kazakh, Uzbek, Italian
